mapper.select: SELECT rez.RESERVATION_ID, rez.MEMBER_ID, rez.RESTAURANT_ID, rt.NAME as RESTAURANT_NAME, rt.CATEGORY as RESTAURANT_CATEGORY, rt.ADDRESS as RESTAURANT_ADDRESS, ri.PATH as RESTAURANT_IMAGE, rez.PAYMENT_ID, rez.TIME, rez.NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, rez.MEMO, rez.STATUS, EXISTS (SELECT * FROM review WHERE review.RESERVATION_ID = rez.RESERVATION_ID AND review.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND review.RESTAURANT_ID = rt.RESTAURANT_ID) AS is_review, rez.CREATED_DATE, rez.UPDATED_DATE FROM reservation rez INNER JOIN restaurant rt on rt.RESTAURANT_ID = rez.RESTAURANT_ID INNER JOIN restaurant_image ri ON ri.RESTAURANT_ID = rt.RESTAURANT_ID AND ri.type = 'REPRESENTATIVE' WHERE rez.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND rez.STATUS = #{status} ORDER BY rez.CREATED_DATE DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation(restaurant_id, member_id, payment_id, time, number_of_people, memo, status) VALUES (#{restaurantId}, #{memberId}, #{paymentId}, #{time}, #{numberOfPeople}, #{memo}, #{status});
mapper.select: SELECT rez.RESERVATION_ID, rez.MEMBER_ID, rez.TIME, rez.NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, rez.MEMO, rez.STATUS, rez.CREATED_DATE, rez.UPDATED_DATE, rez.RESTAURANT_ID, rt.OWNER_ID AS RESTAURANT_OWNER_ID, rt.NAME AS RESTAURANT_NAME, rt.CATEGORY AS RESTAURANT_CATEGORY, rt.CONTENT AS RESTAURANT_CONTENT, rt.PHONE AS RESTAURANT_PHONE, rt.TABLE_PERSON_MAX AS RESTAURANT_TABLE_PERSON_MAX, rt.TABLE_PERSON_MIN AS RESTAURANT_TABLE_PERSON_MIN, rt.OPEN_TIME AS RESTAURANT_OPEN_TIME, rt.LAST_ORDER_TIME AS RESTAURANT_LAST_ORDER_TIME, rt.CLOSE_TIME AS RESTAURANT_CLOSE_TIME, rt.ADDRESS AS RESTAURANT_ADDRESS, rt.DETAIL_ADDRESS AS RESTAURANT_DETAIL_ADDRESS, rt.LUNCH_PRICE AS RESTAURANT_LUNCH_PRICE, rt.DINNER_PRICE AS RESTAURANT_DINNER_PRICE, rt.SAVED_COUNT AS RESTAURANT_SAVED_COUNT, rt.REVIEW_COUNT AS RESTAURANT_REVIEW_COUNT, rt.REVIEW_AVG AS RESTAURANT_REVIEW_AVG, rez.PAYMENT_ID, p.IMP_UID AS PAYMENT_IMP_UID, p.PAY_METHOD AS PAYMENT_PAY_METHOD, p.PRICE AS PAYMENT_PRICE, p.STATUS AS PAYMENT_STATUS FROM reservation rez INNER JOIN restaurant rt ON rt.RESTAURANT_ID = rez.RESTAURANT_ID INNER JOIN payment p ON p.PAYMENT_ID = rez.PAYMENT_ID WHERE rez.RESERVATION_ID = #{reservationId};

select.if: SELECT * FROM reservation rez WHERE #{searchDate} >= cast(rez.TIME as DATE) AND rez.STATUS = #{status};
